CustomField.description: Days from OPD/PRR Complete to Custodial Account Number
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c ), TODAY()- OPD_PRR_Completed__c , Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c - OPD_PRR_Completed__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Days from OPD/PRR Complete to Custodial Account Number
CustomField.label: Time To Account Conv KPI
